q_en: Please store 100 units of product with ID=15 in the auxiliary warehouse.

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM products WHERE attributes = 'Blue, 35 size';
steps.description: Retrieve the product ID for the product with attributes "Blue, 35 size"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse WHERE name = 'Auxiliary warehouse';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse ID for the warehouse with the name "Auxiliary warehouse"

steps.sql: INSERT INTO warehouse_product (warehouse_id, product_id, left_number) VALUES (2, 2, 100);
steps.description: Insert 100 units of the product into the warehouse

response:
